data.lyric:
[ti:Leave Before You Love Me]
[ar:Marshmello/Jonas Brothers/Jonas Brothers]
[al:Leave Before You Love Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Leave Before You Love Me - Marshmello (棉花糖)/Jonas Brothers (乔纳斯兄弟)
[00:02.37]Lyrics by：Marshmello/Alessandro Lindblad/Heavy Mellow/Nicholas Gale/Phil Plested/Richard Boardman/Pablo Bowman/Will Vaughan/Christian Arnold/Geoff Morrow/David Martin
[00:04.75]Composed by：Marshmello/Alessandro Lindblad/Heavy Mellow/Nicholas Gale/Phil Plested/Richard Boardman/Pablo Bowman/Will Vaughan/Christian Arnold/Geoff Morrow/David Martin
[00:07.13]I see you calling
[00:09.32]
[00:11.03]I didn't wanna leave you like that
[00:14.08]
[00:15.00]It's five in the morning yeah yeah
[00:18.36]
[00:18.99]A hundred on the dash
[00:21.64]
[00:22.97]'Cause my wheels are rolling
[00:25.18]
[00:26.92]Ain't taking my foot off the gas
[00:30.38]
[00:31.31]And it only took the one night
[00:33.94]To see the end of the line
[00:35.98]Staring deep in your eyes eyes
[00:38.99]
[00:40.01]Dancing on the edge 'bout to take it too far
[00:43.73]It's messing with my head how I mess with your heart
[00:47.63]If you wake up in your bed alone in the dark
[00:51.52]I'm sorry gotta leave before you love me
[00:55.94]
[00:56.79]Ay ay leave before you love me
[00:59.95]
[01:00.68]Ay ay leave before you love me
[01:03.91]
[01:04.59]Ay ay leave before you love me
[01:07.87]
[01:08.94]Ay ay leave before you love me
[01:11.22]I'm so good at knowing
[01:13.64]
[01:15.07]Of when to leave the party behind
[01:18.46]
[01:19.03]Don't care if they notice yeah yeah no
[01:22.60]
[01:23.10]I'll just catch a ride I'd rather be lonely yeah
[01:30.92]Than wrapped around your body too tight
[01:34.92]Yeah I'm the type to get naked
[01:37.94]Won't give my heart up for breaking
[01:39.90]'Cause I'm too gone to be stayin' stayin'
[01:42.96]Dancing on
[01:44.22]Dancing on the edge 'bout to take it too far
[01:47.87]It's messing with my head how I mess with your heart
[01:51.61]If you wake up in your bed alone in the dark
[01:55.52]I'm sorry gotta leave before you love me
[01:59.88]
[02:00.62]Ay ay leave before you love me
[02:03.88]
[02:04.62]Ay ay leave before you love me
[02:08.38]Ay ay leave before you love me
[02:11.87]
[02:12.49]Ay ay leave before you love me
[02:16.30]Dancing on the edge take it too far
[02:19.95]Messing with my head how I mess with your heart
[02:23.65]I'm sorry alone in the dark
[02:27.40]I'm sorry
[02:29.12]Ay ay leave before you love me
data.trans:
[ti:Leave Before You Love Me]
[ar:Marshmello/Jonas Brothers/Jonas Brothers]
[al:Leave Before You Love Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.37]//
[00:04.75]//
[00:07.13]我看见你不停呼唤
[00:09.32]
[00:11.03]我不想就这样离开你
[00:14.08]
[00:15.00]现在是清晨五点
[00:18.36]
[00:18.99]我以一百迈的速度疾驰
[00:21.64]
[00:22.97]因为我的车轮不停滚动
[00:25.18]
[00:26.92]不会让我的脚离开油门
[00:30.38]
[00:31.31]只是花了一个夜晚
[00:33.94]就看见尽头
[00:35.98]凝视着你的眼睛
[00:38.99]
[00:40.01]在危险的边缘起舞 将要肆无忌惮 为所欲为
[00:43.73]这一切让我不知所措 而我让你心绪不宁 魂不守舍
[00:47.63]如果你在床上醒来 独自一人待在黑暗里
[00:51.52]我很抱歉 我必须在你爱上我之前离去
[00:55.94]
[00:56.79]在你爱上我之前离去
[00:59.95]
[01:00.68]在你爱上我之前离去
[01:03.91]
[01:04.59]在你爱上我之前离去
[01:07.87]
[01:08.94]在你爱上我之前离去
[01:11.22]我驾轻就熟
[01:13.64]
[01:15.07]知道离开舞会的最佳时机
[01:18.46]
[01:19.03]不在乎他们是否注意到
[01:22.60]
[01:23.10]我只是享受美好的旅程 我宁愿孑然一身
[01:30.92]而不是将你的身体紧紧搂在怀中
[01:34.92]我就是那种直抒胸臆的人
[01:37.94]不会因为分道扬镳而放弃我的心
[01:39.90]因为一切转瞬即逝 难以停留
[01:42.96]翩翩起舞
[01:44.22]在危险的边缘起舞 将要肆无忌惮 为所欲为
[01:47.87]这一切让我不知所措 而我让你心绪不宁 魂不守舍
[01:51.61]如果你在床上醒来 独自一人待在黑暗里
[01:55.52]我很抱歉 我必须在你爱上我之前离去
[01:59.88]
[02:00.62]在你爱上我之前离去
[02:03.88]
[02:04.62]在你爱上我之前离去
[02:08.38]在你爱上我之前离去
[02:11.87]
[02:12.49]在你爱上我之前离去
[02:16.30]在危险的边缘起舞 肆无忌惮 为所欲为
[02:19.95]让我不知所措 而我让你心绪不宁 魂不守舍
[02:23.65]我很抱歉 独自一人待在黑暗里
[02:27.40]我很抱歉
[02:29.12]在你爱上我之前离去
